content: It seems we now have a linter that complains about imports between certain combinations of top-level directories. However, it seems to be difficult to turn it off (for development/testing purposes). If you add set_option linter.directoryDependency false anywhere after the imports, then it doesn't work; but if you add it before the imports at the top of the file, then you get complaints from the header style linter.
The list of exceptions is hardcoded in docs#Mathlib.Linter.DirectoryDependency.overrideAllowedImportDirs
Thanks Yael, but I'm not sure how that answers my question, which is "what's the simplest way to disable this linter locally for a single file".
There is no way. You need to add a global exception
